Title: Ingomar, the Barbarian
Writer: D.W. Griffith, Maria Ann Lovell, Ernest Thompson Seton
Actors: Charles Inslee, Harry Solter, Florence Lawrence
Plot: The 33 year old D.W. Griffith brings his stage experience to bear on the screen in this short film. Having been robbed of dialogue that he was used to in a play, he was forced to rely on visuals to tell the story, thus the term: show, don't tell.
